'''The Desert Will Guide You Home (I)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series I]]''. The achievements are earned by following Seelie to their Seelie Courts in [[Hypostyle Desert]], [[Land of Upper Setekh]], and [[Land of Lower Setekh]].
